title: Start
body:
<< Image Desert >><< Name DesertTank >>Hi! I'm DesertTank.
This is an example of using the dialog box extension
and the dialog tree.
Note that blank lines are ignored in the dialog tree.
  
Consecutive spaces seem to be pseudo blank lines.
[[Node2]]

title: Node2
body:
<< Image Green >><< Name GreenTank >> The dialog tree will stop immediately when the last
line is reached. If you want to read the last line slowly,
you will need a dummy line in the dialog tree.
<< Image Desert >><< Name DesertTank >> I'm adding a dummy line to the next line because I want
to close the dialog box when I'm done with this page.
Check it out in Yarn.
⚠️This is a dummy line.
